Programme

AoC Annual Conference & Exhibition, 15-17 November 2016, The ICC Birmingham

  • Tues Nov 15th

  • Weds Nov 16th

  • Thurs Nov 17th

10.00 - 11.00Sixth Form Colleges Fringe Session

'The place of sixth form colleges in the future education landscape'

Chaired by Mark Bramwell, Associate Director of Sixth Form Colleges, Association of Colleges

Panel members:

  • Yolanda Botham, Principal, Lowestoft Sixth Form College
  • Julian Gravatt, Assistant Chief Executive, Association of Colleges
  • Chris Thomson, Brighton Hove and Sussex Sixth Form College
Breakout session
